about_the_game:
Steel Judgment is a roguelike movement shooter all about expressive and chaotic combat. Inspired by games like ULTRAKILL and Risk of Rain 2, the game combines the expressive combat of beat em' ups with the unhinged chaos of a roguelike into one action-packed first-person shooter.

You are an advanced combat shell named Orpheus on a mission to hunt down the tyrant behind the invasion of your home world. However, it seems this war stretches beyond just your realm and theirs...

Venture through the realms and tear through your enemies

Travel through a series of hand-crafted zones filled with distinct enemy types and intense boss fights inspired by character-action & fighting games. Use a wide range of mobility options and attacks to stylishly mow them down, and taunt them to keep yourself alive!

Discover and master unique weapons and items

Every weapon in Steel Judgment has a unique design with deep synergies and mechanics for you to master. Likewise, items also provide powerful passive or active effects for you to create world-shattering builds with!

Steal enemy abilities by countering them

Countering an enemy will rip the essence from their attack, allowing you to copy their moves! Your essence attacks synergize with your weapons as well.

Unleash combos with a diverse and versatile moveset

In Steel Judgment, taunt-cancelling allows you to empower various actions in your moveset. Jumping turns into an uppercut, punches become stronger with more knockback, and more! Use these moves in conjunction with your weapons to combo enemies as far as your imagination can go.

Strength in numbers your enemies may have, but a legion of prey is no match for your might. All who stand in your path shall face Steel Judgment!

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11

Recommended:

short_description: Steel Judgment is an ultra-fast roguelike movement FPS full of wacky combos and weapons that combines the expressive combat of beat-em' ups with the unhinged chaos of a roguelike. Wipe out hordes of enemies with a diverse moveset and arsenal while collecting powerful items with unique effects.
